text.title: Rwandan Supreme Court agrees to hear case on allowing third presidential term
text.head: Rwandan Supreme Court agrees to hear case on allowing third presidential term
Sources

list.item: Clement Uwiringiyimana. "Rwanda court agrees to hear case to block president's third term" — Reuters , September 9, 2015
"Rwanda court to hear case on president's third term" — Al-Jazeera , September 9, 2015
